solution.text:
we know tangent intersect at 1 point so , t=1
maximum number of parallel tangents on a circle is m=2
therefore, _{j}_\(\times \)t + _{k}_\(\times \)m=_{j}_\(\times \)1 + _{k}_\(\times \)2=_{{j+k*2}}_

content.text: find the value of _{j}_t+_{k}_m, if t is the number of point(s) at which a tangent intersects a circle and m is the maximum number of parallel tangents a circle can have
